note: Totals by geographical region are WIPO estimates. Each region includes the following number of offices: Africa (34), Asia (46), Europe (44), Latin America and the Caribbean (31), Northern America (2) and Oceania (7).
title: Life science patents granted, by technology
subtitle: [Patents](#dod:patents) granted within the fields of medical technology, biotechnology, and pharmaceuticals by filing office. These patents include medical devices, diagnostic methods, genetic engineering techniques, biotechnological processes and new drugs.

display.name: Biotechnology
